briefdescription.para: Show a color picker dialog when clicked.
Emit colorClicked signal only, no dialog.
Specifies the behavior when the button is clicked.
Store current color when start picking.
Construct a new color ramp button.

detaileddescription.para: Use parent to attach a parent QWidget to the dialog. Use cdt string to define the title to show in the color ramp dialog Use a color scheme registry for color swatch grids to show in the drop-down menu. If not specified, the button will use the global color scheme registry instead

briefdescription.para: Returns whether opacity modification (transparency) is permitted for the color.

simplesect.para: true if opacity modification is allowed

briefdescription.para: Returns the behavior for when the button is clicked.
Returns the currently selected color.
Returns the title for the color chooser dialog window.

simplesect.para: title for the color chooser dialog

briefdescription.para: Returns the color scheme registry for the button, which controls the color swatch grids that are shown in the button's drop-down menu.

simplesect.para: color scheme registry for the button. If returned value is 0 then all color swatch grids are hidden from the button's drop-down menu.

briefdescription.para: Returns the context string for the color button.

detaileddescription.para:
The context string is passed to all color swatch grids shown in the button's drop-down menu, to allow them to customize their display colors based on the context.
context string for the color button's color swatch grids
setContext

briefdescription.para: Returns the default color for the button, which is shown in the button's drop-down menu for the "default color" option.

simplesect.para: default color for the button. Returns an invalid QColor if the default color option is disabled.

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the current color is null.
Returns the string used for the "no color" option in the button's drop-down menu.

simplesect.para: string used for the "no color" menu option
The "no color" option is only shown if the color button is set to show an alpha channel in the color dialog

briefdescription.para: Sets whether opacity modification (transparency) is permitted for the color.

detaileddescription.para:
Defaults to false.
allowOpacity
set to true to allow opacity modification
allowOpacity()
QGIS 3.0

briefdescription.para: Sets the behavior for when the button is clicked.

detaileddescription.para:
The default behavior is to show a color picker dialog.
behavior
behavior when button is clicked
behavior

briefdescription.para: Set the title for the color chooser dialog window.

parameterdescription.para: Title for the color chooser dialog

briefdescription.para: Sets the color scheme registry for the button, which controls the color swatch grids that are shown in the button's drop-down menu.

parameterdescription.para: color scheme registry for the button. Set to 0 to hide all color swatch grids from the button's drop-down menu.

briefdescription.para: Sets the context string for the color button.

detaileddescription.para:
The context string is passed to all color swatch grids shown in the button's drop-down menu, to allow them to customize their display colors based on the context.
context
context string for the color button's color swatch grids
context

briefdescription.para: Sets the default color for the button, which is shown in the button's drop-down menu for the "default color" option.

parameterdescription.para: default color for the button. Set to an invalid QColor to disable the default color option.

briefdescription.para: Sets the string to use for the "no color" option in the button's drop-down menu.

parameterdescription.para: string to use for the "no color" menu option

simplesect.para: The "no color" option is only shown if the color button is set to show an alpha channel in the color dialog

briefdescription.para: Sets whether the drop-down menu should be shown for the button.

detaileddescription.para:
The default behavior is to show the menu.
showMenu
set to false to hide the drop-down menu
showMenu

briefdescription.para: Sets whether the "no color" option should be shown in the button's drop-down menu.

detaileddescription.para:
If selected, the "no color" option sets the color button's color to a totally transparent color.
showNoColorOption
set to true to show the no color option. This is disabled by default.
showNoColor
setNoColorString
The "no color" option is only shown if the color button is set to show an alpha channel in the color dialog

briefdescription.para: Sets whether a set to null (clear) option is shown in the button's drop-down menu.

parameterdescription.para: set to true to show a null option

briefdescription.para: Returns whether the drop-down menu is shown for the button.

simplesect.para: true if drop-down menu is shown

briefdescription.para: Returns whether the "no color" option is shown in the button's drop-down menu.

detaileddescription.para:
If selected, the "no color" option sets the color button's color to a totally transparent color.
true if the no color option is shown.
setShowNoColor
noColorString
The "no color" option is only shown if the color button is set to show an alpha channel in the color dialog

briefdescription.para: Returns whether the set to null (clear) option is shown in the button's drop-down menu.
Creates an icon for displaying a color in a drop-down menu.

detaileddescription.para: If showChecks set to true, then a checkboard pattern will be shown behind semi-transparent colors.

briefdescription.para: Activates the color picker tool, which allows for sampling a color from anywhere on the screen.
Copies the current color to the clipboard.
Pastes a color from the clipboard to the color button.

detaileddescription.para:
If clipboard does not contain a valid color or string representation of a color, then no change is applied.
copyColor

briefdescription.para: Sets the background pixmap for the button based upon color and transparency.

detaileddescription.para:
Call directly to update background after adding/removing QColorDialog::ShowAlphaChannel option but the color has not changed, i.e. setColor() wouldn't update button and you want the button to retain the set color's alpha component regardless
color
Color for button background. If no color is specified, the button's current color will be used

briefdescription.para: Sets the current color for the button.

detaileddescription.para:
Will emit a colorChanged signal if the color is different to the previous color.
color
new color for the button
color

briefdescription.para: Sets color to the button's default color, if set.
Sets color to a totally transparent color.

simplesect.para: If the color button is not set to show an opacity channel in the color dialog then the color will not be changed.

briefdescription.para: Sets color to null.
Is emitted whenever a new color is set for the button.

detaileddescription.para:
The color is always valid. In case the new color is the same no signal is emitted, to avoid infinite loops.
color
New color

briefdescription.para: Emitted when the button is clicked, if the button's behavior is set to SignalOnly.
Reimplemented to accept dragged colors.
Reimplemented to reset button appearance after drag leave.
Reimplemented to accept dropped colors.
Reimplemented to allow canceling color pick via keypress, and sample via space bar press.
Reimplemented to allow dragging colors from button.
Reimplemented to detect right mouse button clicks on the color button and allow dragging colors.
Reimplemented to allow color picking.
Returns a checkboard pattern pixmap for use as a background to transparent colors.
Attempts to parse mimeData as a color, either via the mime data's color data or by parsing a textual representation of a color.

simplesect.para: true if mime data could be intrepreted as a color

briefdescription.para: Ends a color picking operation.

parameterdescription.para: global position of pixel to sample color from
set to true to actually sample the color, false to just cancel the color picking operation

briefdescription.para: Adds a color to the recent colors list.

parameterdescription.para: to add to recent colors list

briefdescription.para: Creates the drop-down menu entries.
Sets color for button, if valid.
Sets color for button, if valid.

detaileddescription.para: The color is treated as a temporary color, and is not added to the recent colors list.

briefdescription.para: A cross platform button subclass for selecting colors.

detaileddescription.para:
Will open a color chooser dialog when clicked. Offers live updates to button from color chooser dialog. An attached drop-down menu allows for copying and pasting colors, picking colors from the screen, and selecting colors from color swatch grids.
QGIS 2.5
